about.title: About Me
about.name: Christian Rios
about.bio: I combine AI expertise with full-stack development to create solutions that truly impact businesses. With experience across WordPress, Shopify, Next.js, and more, I bring a unique perspective that bridges cutting-edge AI with practical web development.
about.bio2: My approach is purpose-built: understanding your goals first, then crafting the right technology stack to achieve them. Whether you need an AI-powered automation, a high-converting e-commerce store, or a custom web application, I deliver quality craft with fast execution.

metadata.title: Websites for Businesses in Venezuela | Flamingo Devs
metadata.description: Digital sales machines for your business in Venezuela. Catalogs, online stores and automation. USD pricing, fast delivery, monthly support.

hero.title: We don't sell websites.
hero.subtitle: Your business serving customers 24/7, without messages getting lost in WhatsApp. Transparent pricing, fast delivery, and ongoing support.

messages.title: 100 messages a day asking for prices
messages.description: Your WhatsApp overwhelmed answering the same thing over and over.

instagram.title: You only have Instagram
instagram.description: Being a digital street vendor. If you get hacked, you lose everything.

inventory.title: Inventory in your head
inventory.description: No stock control or automated sales records.

payments.title: Manual payments
payments.description: Waiting for payment screenshots all day long.

packs.title: Choose Your Pack
packs.subtitle: 3 solutions designed for Venezuelan businesses. No surprises, no fine print.

pack1.name: Express Catalog
pack1.idealFor: Auto parts, Small clothing shops, Hardware stores
pack1.painSolved: People ask me prices 100 times a day
features: Hosting and domain included first year

pack2.name: E-commerce Pro
pack2.painSolved: I want automatic payments and inventory control

pack3.name: Total Automation
pack3.idealFor: Car dealerships, Import businesses, Large companies
pack3.painSolved: I need CRM, automated emails and funnels

value.title: Why do you need a website?

centralization.title: Centralization
centralization.description: Stop losing sales because the message got buried in WhatsApp. Your website serves 24/7.

professionalism.title: Professionalism
professionalism.description: Having only Instagram is like being a digital street vendor. Having a .com is having your own store.

security.title: Protection
security.description: What if tomorrow your Instagram gets hacked? You lose all customers. The website is yours.

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Your business working while you sleep. Automatic orders, payments, and notifications.

process.title: How do we work?
process.subtitle: Clear and fast process. No hassle.

step1.title: Close and Pay
step1.description: We talk, choose the pack, and you pay 50% to start.

step2.title: Collection
step2.description: I send you a simple form: logo, photos, and price list in Excel.

step3.title: Building
step3.description: I build your website with optimized professional templates.

step4.title: Review
step4.description: One round of changes to adjust details to your liking.

step5.title: Delivery
step5.description: Your website ready and running. You pay the remaining 50%.

maintenance.title: Monthly Support
maintenance.subtitle: Your website always running, worry-free
maintenance.description: Maintenance includes hosting, automatic backups, security updates, and technical support. You focus on selling, I take care of everything working.

q1.question: Do you charge in dollars?
q1.answer: Yes, all prices are in USD. We accept Zelle, PayPal, and international transfers.

q2.question: What if I don't have professional photos?
q2.answer: I'll guide you to take good photos with your phone. I can also use stock images if needed.

q3.question: Is maintenance mandatory?
q3.answer: It's not mandatory, but highly recommended. Without maintenance, you handle hosting and updates yourself.

q4.question: Can I add more products later?
q4.answer: Yes, monthly maintenance includes minor changes. For bulk uploads, it's quoted separately.

q5.question: Does it work with Mobile Payment?
q5.answer: Yes. The customer makes the payment, uploads the screenshot, and you verify manually before processing.

cta.title: Ready to get your sales machine?
cta.subtitle: Message me on WhatsApp and let's talk about which pack is ideal for your business.
cta.note: I respond in less than 24 hours

metadata.keywords: web analyzer, speed test, lighthouse, core web vitals, free seo, web performance

analyzer.title: Web Performance Analyzer
analyzer.subtitle: Get a complete report on speed, SEO, accessibility and best practices for any website or online store.

loading.title: Analyzing your site...
loading.description: This may take between 15 and 30 seconds

errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Loading speed, time to interactive and Core Web Vitals (LCP, CLS, TBT).

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Screen reader compatibility, color contrast and keyboard navigation.

bestPractices.title: Best Practices
bestPractices.description: HTTPS, optimized images, and code without console errors.

seo.title: SEO
seo.description: Meta tags, titles, descriptions and content structure optimized for search engines.

whyMatters.title: Why does performance matter?
whyMatters.description1: A slow site loses visitors and sales. Google considers speed as a ranking factor, and users expect pages to load in less than 3 seconds.
whyMatters.description2: For online stores (Shopify, WordPress, etc.), performance directly impacts conversions. Every second of delay can mean a 7% drop in sales.

stats.title: Important data:
stats.item1: 53% of visitors leave if it takes more than 3 seconds
stats.item3: Core Web Vitals affect Google ranking

problems.title: Problems we detect
problems.cart: Abandoned cart: Customer leaves just before paying
problems.checkout: Endless checkout: Too many steps to complete purchase
problems.shipping: Surprise shipping costs that scare away customers
problems.trust: Lack of trust: Store looks fake or insecure
problems.speed: Slow store: Customers leave before seeing products
problems.photos: Bad photos: Can't see detail or real colors

testimonials.title: What My Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Over 48 completed projects with perfect rating on Workana. 9 clients have hired me again.

testimonial1.text: I had a critical problem with my WordPress portal and Christian solved it in record time, also proposing other actions to prevent this in the future. Totally recommended!

testimonial2.text: Excellent work with our Shopify store. Christian understood exactly what we needed and delivered ahead of schedule. Communication was impeccable throughout the project.

testimonial3.text: Top-level professional. He developed our e-commerce with all the features we asked for and also optimized the SEO. Sales increased 40% in the first month.

testimonial4.text: Christian configured product variants in our Shopify store flawlessly. A complex project he handled with total professionalism and speed.

testimonial5.text: We've worked with Christian on multiple projects. His technical knowledge and problem-solving ability are exceptional. He's always my first choice.

testimonial6.text: The automation Christian implemented saves us hours of manual work every week. He perfectly integrated all our tools with AI and automated workflows.
